A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Doesn't even deserve one star.

-Attack run on AT-ATs was pointless
-Finn/Rose convoluted storyline ruins pacing
-Superman Princess Leia made me want to throw things at the screen
-Poe vs Laura Dern's character - ends up being pointless and wastes lots of screentime

These four points alone are enough to ruin what would have been a decent movie.
